value.title: New ML benchmarks show best algorithms for training chatbots
value.excerpt: As quickly as AI and ML have grown, MLCommons has been updating its MLPerf Training benchmarks. The latest revision, Training version 3.0, adds testing for training large language models (LLM), specifically for GPT-3, the LLM used in ChatGPT. This is the first revision of the benchmark to include such testing.
